TopicTitle: Career mode revert flight is no longer career-mode reverting

Articles.Content:
Anyone know what can be causing this? I had installed some atmospheric sound mods and removed them once the problem arose. Does not make a difference, even when moving my saved game file to a prior instance of KSP. I get ships left on the runway, KIA kerbils and large rep losses. thanks

Edit: Just redid a clean install of KSP. My mods are mostly contract & navigation related. The problem persists, so I think it is in my saved game file.

Edit: may have been caused by having too many contracts open. clearing them appears to have solved the problem.

Edited September 13, 2015 by jiminator

Hard to tell what your actual problem is by your description. Are you unable to revert? If that is the case the game does not allow it one you have left the craft to go to another or to the space center.
